com.phunware.engagement.location

Interface LocationManager


  • public interface LocationManager
    LocationManager provides access to nearby Geozones and allows you to perform actions like checking in to a location. You can also supply a LocationListener to be notified of location related events, such as the addition or removal of geo zones, or entry and exit events.

    To receive geo zone notifications when your Activity is in the foreground, used to perform actions like updating the application UI or displaying additional information, add a LocationListener via the addLocationListener(LocationListener) method. Note that you must also remove the listener via removeLocationListener(LocationListener) to avoid leaks.

    To be notified of geo zone events while the app isn't running, you will need to add an IntentService to your manifest that response to at least one of the following intent-filters:

    • com.phunware.engagement.ZONE_ADDED
    • com.phunware.engagement.ZONE_REMOVED
    • com.phunware.engagement.ZONE_UPDATED
    • com.phunware.engagement.ZONE_ENTERED
    • com.phunware.engagement.ZONE_EXITED
    • com.phunware.engagement.ZONE_CHECK_IN
    • com.phunware.engagement.ZONE_CHECK_IN_FAILURE

    To ensure your service is only launched for events that you actually handle, you should only register for the actions that are important to you.

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableGeozones

        void getAvailableGeozones(Callback<List<Geozone>> callback)
        Retrieves all available Geozones currently known to the device, whether or not they are being monitored.
        Parameters:
        callback - A callback to receive the available geo zones.

      • getMonitoredGeozones

        void getMonitoredGeozones(Callback<List<Geozone>> callback)
        Retrieves all Geozones currently being monitored for entry/exit transitions.
        Parameters:
        callback - A callback to receive the monitored geo zones.

      • getInsideGeozones

        void getInsideGeozones(Callback<List<Geozone>> callback)
        Retrieves all Geozones that the user is currently inside.
        Parameters:
        callback - A callback to receive the geo zones.

      • getGeozone

        void getGeozone(long id,
                Callback<Geozone> callback)
        Retrieves a Geozone by id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the geo zone.
        callback - A callback to receive the geo zone.

      • getGeozones

        void getGeozones(Collection<Long> geozoneIds,
                 Callback<List<Geozone>> callback)
        Retrieves a list of Geozone by specified IDs.
        Parameters:
        geozoneIds - A list of geo zone IDs.
        callback - A callback to receive the geo zone.

      • addLocationListener

        void addLocationListener(LocationListener listener)
        Add a LocationListener to receive events when the user enters or exits a Geozone, or geo zones are added, deleted or modified in the manager. Be sure to remove the listener when it is no longer needed using removeLocationListener(LocationListener)
        Parameters:
        listener - The LocationListener to be notified of location events.
        See Also:
        removeLocationListener(LocationListener)

      • removeLocationListener

        void removeLocationListener(LocationListener listener)
        Remove a LocationListener from the LocationManager.
        Parameters:
        listener - The LocationListener to remove.
